entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023
